name: Author URI: http://www.shanewebguy.com/
author: Shane Clark

sections.description:
This wordpress plugin enables a web designer / graphic artist show off his greatest works in its full glory. Using the latest user experience, You – the designer now have the power to display your amazing portfolio. This portfolio plugin is the first and finest of its kind in the wordpress repository so you don’t even have to worry about anything. Plus we got cool support on board – you can email us directly at support@shanewebguy.com

AND of course do not ever forget to visit our cool website that serves as demo of this plugin as well – http://www.shanewebguy.com
sections.installation:
• 1) Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation or use the built-in plugin installer in your wordpress
  • 2) Activate the plugin from Plugins page.
  • 3) Edit a page that you want your portfolio to appear on and paste [swg_portfolio] into it.
  • 4) Add your websites in Shane Web Guy Portfolio within your WordPress admin area.
sections.faq:
Is this on active development?

Yes, http://www.shanewebguy.com is developing this plugin.

Do you provide support for this plug-in?

Yes, please contact support@shanewebguy.com or call 1-408-385-1119

Do you take on custom WordPress, HTML and Design Work.?

Yes,  Please visit http://www.shanewebguy.com and check out my portfolio site.

Can this plugin be styled via CSS.?

Yes,  Please visit http://www.shanewebguy.com and look for the styling guide.
